story.title: Our Story
story.subtitle: Plant Based Kitchen, Inspired by Nature
story.missionText: At Lil Green Kitchen, we believe in the power of plant-based nutrition. Our mission is to offer delicious, nutrient-rich meals that are good for you and the planet. We use only seasonal, regional ingredients and completely avoid refined sugar.
story.sustainabilityText: We work closely with local farmers and producers to source the freshest ingredients and minimize our ecological footprint. Our packaging is compostable or reusable.
story.sourcingText: From the fields around Starnberg to your plate – we know exactly where our ingredients come from and only work with producers who share our values.

datenschutz.title: Privacy Policy
datenschutz.intro: We take the protection of your personal data very seriously. We treat your personal data confidentially and in accordance with statutory data protection regulations and this privacy policy.
datenschutz.collection: 1. Collection and Storage of Personal Data
datenschutz.collectionText: When you use our contact or catering form, we collect the following data: name, email address, phone number and your message. This data is only used to process your inquiry.
datenschutz.purposeText: Your data is collected exclusively to answer your inquiries and to process our services.
datenschutz.retentionText: Your data will be deleted as soon as it is no longer required to achieve the purpose for which it was collected, but no later than 2 years.
datenschutz.rightsText: You have the right to information, correction, deletion or restriction of the processing of your stored data at any time, as well as the right to object to processing.
datenschutz.contactText: If you have any questions about data protection, please contact: info@lilgreen.de
